article.name: Throwing Pose
article.description:
This render was my first test of the bones! Wow, I was impressed. Look, it moved, it moved!
I pulled the bones around, and formed a pretty neat pose of him ready to throw. I\'m no pro character animator, but its kinda fun! Still alot to learn though.
article.keywords: ain't, human, mouse, 3d, model, graphic, texture, 3ds, max, animation, bones, clear, standing, humanoid, view, detail, polygon, animation, walking.
